import "./Navbar.css"; import Logo from "../../Assets/Logo.png"; import { Link, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import { useState } from "react"; // Import useState for managing menu state function Navbar() { const location = useLocation(); // Correctly call useLocation const [isMenuOpen, setIsMenuOpen] = useState(false); // State for mobile menu const toggleMenu = () => { setIsMenuOpen(!isMenuOpen); // Toggle the current state }; // Determine the active section based on the current URL path const isWorkPage = location.pathname === "/Work"; const isInfoPage = location.pathname === "/Info"; return (
Minuri Senara
Full Stack Developer
{/* Navigation Links */}
Work
Info
LinkedIn
Resume
); } export default Navbar;
